function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High","name":"Ineffectiveness of travel bans in reducing covid-19 cases outside wuhan and hubei"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Underreported cases of covid-19"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Large fraction of the population remains at risk of covid-19"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High","name":"Lack of travel ban and emergency response leading to 744,000 confirmed covid-19 cases"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Inadequate individual control measures during chinese spring festival holiday"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High","name":"High incidence of confirmed cases in hubei and other provinces"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High","name":"Initial high case reproduction number r0 of 3.15"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Inadequate response to outbreak in cities"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High","name":"Rapid dispersal of covid-19 from wuhan due to travel"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High","name":"Strong correlation between number of cases and travelers from wuhan"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High","name":"Delay in implementing emergency control measures"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Ineffective prohibition of intercity travel"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High","name":"Uncertainty about the effectiveness of travel restrictions and social distancing measures in preventing the spread of infection"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Poor understanding of sars-cov-2 transmission patterns and the impact of interventions"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Lack of comprehensive data on covid-19 epidemiology, human movement, and public health interventions"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High","name":"Human-to-human transmission of the sars-cov-2 virus"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Large-scale travel movements during the spring festival holiday"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High","name":"Lack of vaccine or specific drug treatment for covid-19"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases from wild animals to humans"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Risk of zoonotic disease transmission through wildlife conservation activities"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Movement of researchers from higher income countries to developing countries"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Ineffective monitoring and intervention activities during perturbations"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Transmission of covid-19 from local communities to endangered great ape populations"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Declines in food security, trade, and tourism leading to reduction in incentives to conserve local biodiversity"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Boosting of tourism revenues leading to negative impacts on biodiversity conservation and wider sustainability goals"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Enhanced public interest in sustainability and community action"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Opportunities for health and well-being in nature"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"One health approach in guinea-bissau and indonesia"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Global travel restrictions leading to decreased tourism and economic impact on conservation sites"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Increased focus on local conservation leading to overcrowding and environmental degradation at local sites"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Renewed interest in national parks and conservation leading to overexploitation and disturbance of natural ecosystems"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Reduced local capacity due to travel and work restrictions and lost training opportunities"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Loss of partnerships"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Interspecies transmission and pandemic risk"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Impact of covid-19 restrictions on human movement and trade on habitats, with quantifiable data lacking."},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Deterioration of stability leading to an increase in violence, illegal hunting, and illicit trade due to acute perturbations such as war or strife."},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Covid-related collapse of the international cashew market leading to food insecurity for farmers working in the cantanhez national park."},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Recognizing trade-offs in conservation research agendas due to reduced future spending and accelerating climate and biodiversity crises."},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Understanding human-nature interactions, including inter-species disease transmission pathways, and changes in motivations for seeking interactions with nature due to the pandemic."},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Zoonotic disease outbreaks including covid-19"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Large-scale engineering projects"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Sudden economic or political change"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through wildlife and the environment"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Risk of zoonotic disease spillover due to perturbations in wildlife and ecology"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium","name":"Potential impact of conservation activities perturbation on disease vectors and transmission"}]}
